Package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.log

Class LogQuest

java.lang.Object
io.cyborgcode.utilities.logging.LogCore
io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.log.LogQuest
public final class LogQuest extends io.cyborgcode.utilities.logging.LogCore
Provides structured logging utilities for test execution.

This class extends LogCore and offers various logging levels tailored for test execution, including information, warnings, errors, debugging, tracing, and validation-specific logs.

The logging is categorized under the "ROA.QUEST" namespace, ensuring test-related logs are distinguishable from other logs in the system.

This class follows the singleton pattern, ensuring that only one instance of LogQuest exists.
